alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Taylor, Madison, southern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Madison, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Madison, Lake Park, Valdosta, Dasher, Greenville, Lee, Dills, Twin Lakes, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville and Hanson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
